name: HIVE MIND RENEGADE
description:
This is a kind of personal challenge for me. I tried to implemente all that i have learn of Artificial Inteligence in the past two years.

I use the theme of the Jam "Breaking the rules" as a narrative theme, you are part of a whole universe of robots controlled by the "Hive mind", but you choose to break the rules of this world an rebel against the system.

This roguelike game implemented a simple state driven AI in the enemies, Procedural generation for the map and procedural animations for the characters.
